<!-- Do not edit this file. It is generated automatically -->

## toAsync() function

AsyncIterable を返します。`toAsync`は Iterable 内の Promise 値を処理したい場合に使用します。

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function toAsync<T>(
  iter: Iterable<T | Promise<T>>,
): AsyncIterableIterator<T>;
```

## Example

```ts
let acc = 0;
for await (const item of toAsync([1, 2, 3, 4, 5])) {
  acc += item;
}
// acc: 15

// with pipe
await pipe(
  [Promise.resolve(1), Promise.resolve(2), Promise.resolve(3)],
  toAsync,
  map((a) => a + 10),
  toArray, // [11, 12, 13]
);
```

[Try It](https://codesandbox.io/s/fxts-toasync-00nxr)

see [pipe](https://fxts.dev/docs/pipe)<!-- -->, [toAsync](https://fxts.dev/docs/toAsync)<!-- -->, [toArray](https://fxts.dev/docs/toArray)

[Open Source Code](https://github.com/marpple/FxTS/blob/main/src/Lazy/toAsync.ts)
